pullRequest.title: Fix the static method to extract status code from exceptions
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fix by replacing Optional.of(...) with Optional.ofNullable(...)
Add tests to verify status code extraction

commit.message:
Fix the static method to extract status code from exceptions

* Fix by replacing Optional.of(...) with Optional.ofNullable(...)
* Add tests to verify status code extraction

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>
